title: Lopes
body: «Diogo Lopes, from Estacada, as the annotator of the Saudades says, was one of the first settlers of the island of Madeira: he lived in Câmara de Lobos, in the place called Torre, and his sesmaria covered much of the land from Pico towards Funchal to Covão».

Diogo Lopes: One of the first settlers of the island of Madeira
